- "foo" Foo and another "idstylequote"
  - [x] Foo 1
  - [x] Foo 2
  - [x] Foo 3
  - [ ] Foo 4

- [x] "bar" ++Bar and another "idstylequote"
  - [x] Most of "foo"
  - [x] Bar 1
  - [x] Bar 2

- “zar” -Zar and another "idstylequote"
  - [ ] Most of “foo”
  - [x] Zar 1
  - [x] Zar 2

- [ ] ++Goal goal goal
  - [x] Most of “bar”
  - [ ] Nar 1
  - [ ] Nar 2
